key.name: position
key.description: Determines where the Spotify controls appear on the top bar. Possible values are: - 'far-left', 'mid-left', 'rightmost-left' (Left Side) - 'middle-left', 'center', 'middle-right' (Center) - 'leftmost-right', 'mid-right', 'far-right' (Right Side)

key.name: controls-position
key.description: Specify where the playback controls should appear: 'left' or 'right' of the track info.

key.name: show-playback-controls
key.description: Toggle the visibility (on/off) of the playback controls (Previous, Play/Pause, Next) in the Spotify indicator.

key.name: show-spotify-icon
key.description: Toggle the visibility of the Spotify logo in the top bar.

key.name: enable-volume-control
key.description: Toggle the volume control feature using the scroll wheel over the song title in the top bar.

key.name: show-track-info
key.description: Toggle the visibility of the Artist and Track information in the top bar.

key.name: enable-middle-click
key.description: Toggles whether the user can Play/Pause with a middle-click on the extension icon.

key.name: minimize-on-second-click
key.description: If toggled, a second click on the extension will minimize Spotify if it is already in the foreground. If un-toggled, clicking the extension again while Spotify is on top does nothing.
